name: Monozukuri Ventures
headquarter_location_freeform: Umekoji MArKEt 3F, 34 Suzaku Hozocho, Shimogyo-ku, Kyoto-shi, Kyoto-fu, 600-8846 Japan
description: Monozukuri Ventures is dedicated to helping the world's entrepreneurs rapidly deliver high-quality products to the market, regardless of production volume. As a global ecosystem contributor, it provides founders with essential resources such as investment, mentorship, prototyping know-how, manufacturing expertise, and community support. The firm aims to build a global ecosystem that prioritizes the growth of startups, believing that the success of startups benefits all partners in industry, government, and academia. Monozukuri Ventures was formed through the merger of Kyoto-based Darma Tech Labs and New York-based FabFoundry, leveraging their combined knowledge and networks to grow alongside startups.

professional_info.fund_size: Monozukuri Ventures announced the final close of its 2nd Fund in July 2022, indicating a significant fund size but not specifying the amount.
